text: mn esa allah fi hayatah wanhrf ean tariq alhda, fala yujza fi alakhirat 'iilaa eqabana yusawi mesyth, wman 'atae allah waeamil salhana bamtthal awamrh wajtnab nwahyh, dhkrana kan 'aw antha, wahu mumin biallah muahad lh, fawlyk yadkhulun aljnt, yrzqhm allah fiha min thmarha wneymha wldhatha bighayr hsab
